traits.name: Action Surge (Recharges on a Short or Long Rest)
entries: On his turn, Othelstan can take one additional action.

traits.name: Tiamat's Blessing of Retribution
entries: When Othelstan takes damage that reduces him to 0 hit points, he immediately regains 20 hit points. If he has 20 hit points or fewer at the end of his next turn, he dies.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Othelstan attacks twice with his flail or spear, or makes two ranged attacks with his spears.

actions.name: Flail
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4 damage) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Spear
entries: Melee/Ranged atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or ranged 20/60 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4 damage) piercing damage.
